description:
After receiving the phone call, the gang rushes to Hinohikari`s side to find him burnt to a crisp. It seems he`s fallen ill from pushing himself too hard because the next event for the busy and popular Love Rice is drawing near... and he`s been told that he has no chance of performing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legendary Six Rice Boys (Mixed Rice)
幻の6人米[シックスライス]
